department: Department of National Defence (Ministère de la Défense nationale)
short_summary: Bid for vehicular equipment and components.
description: File Number: W8486-259682/A. The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at 25CFSD Montreal and 7CFSD Edmonton by August 30th, 2024. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NSCM/CAGE they are offering.
duration_in_months: Il ne s'agit pas d'un appel d'offres à long terme, mais plutôt d'un appel d'offres limité en temps.
full_summary:

## Tender Description:
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of various vehicular equipment components, including load cells, cable assemblies, O-rings, nuts, clamps, and other spare parts. The tender is open to all qualified suppliers.

### Specifications and Quantities:
A detailed list of the required items, including specifications and quantities, is provided in the attached tender package.

### Tender Documents:
The tender package includes the following documents:

* W8486-259682 - CEE Spare Parts RFP - English
* W8486-259682-Amendment Modification-2 - English
* W8486-259682-Amendment Modification-1 - English
* W8486-259682 - CEE Pièces de rechange RFP - French
* W8486-259682-Amendment Modification-2 - French
* W8486-259682-Amendment Modification-1 - French

### Bidding Instructions:
Prospective bidders must submit their tenders electronically to the following email address: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca. The tender closing date is June 24th, 2024, at 14:00:00.
